definitions: at right angles to a horizontal plane; aligned in such a way that the top is directly above the bottom

examples.text: the wheel hangs vertically from a wire

shortDefinitions: at right angles to horizontal plane

definitions: in a way that involves different levels or stages of a hierarchy or process
shortDefinitions: in way that involves different levels of hierarchy

definitions: (with reference to passage of diseases) from one generation to the next

examples.text: the bacteria are vertically transmitted from mother to offspring
